solution_line_template: First find the total amount of money Jackson spent on movie tickets: {num_tickets} tickets * ${cost_per_ticket}/ticket = $<<{num_tickets}*{cost_per_ticket}={total_movie_cost}>>{total_movie_cost}
Then add the amount he spent on the video game: ${total_movie_cost} + ${computer_game_cost} = $<<{total_movie_cost}+{computer_game_cost}={total_entertainment_cost}>>{total_entertainment_cost}
